|文学部部员A Literature Club Member A
This story takes place in...
这个故事发生在……
Fordrain Village|福德雷恩村
Lavanian Fort|拉瓦尼亚堡
Iccypunk|埃斯朋克镇
Woodin Castle|梧丁城
Fordrain Village|福德雷恩村

`Your were born in Iccypunk. Like everyone else here, you look like an ice cream cone, and are good at generating ice pitons from your nose and stabbing enemies to death with them.|你出生在了埃斯朋克镇。你和这个地方的其他人一样，长得跟甜筒雪糕一样，而且你擅长用鼻涕做成冰锥捅死敌人。`
Lavanian Fort|拉瓦尼亚堡

`You were born in Lavanian Fort. Like everyone else here, you were born with a butt for your face, and a face on your butt. You are exceptionally resistant to heat.|你出生在了拉瓦尼亚堡。你和这个地方的其他人一样，屁股长在了你的脸上，脸长在了屁股上，而且你非常耐热。`
Iccypunk|埃斯朋克镇

`You were born in Iccypunk. Like everyone else here, you look like an ice cream cone, and are good at generating ice pitons from your nose and stabbing enemies to death with them.|你出生在了埃斯朋克镇。你和这个地方的其他人一样，长得跟甜筒雪糕一样，而且你擅长用鼻涕做成冰锥捅死敌人。`
Woodin Castle|梧丁城
`You were born in Woodin Castle. Like everyone else here, you look like a tree stump, and passing travelers love to peepee on you.|你出生在了梧丁城。你和这个地方的其他人一样，长得像个树桩，而且过路的旅行者都喜欢在你这里尿尿。`
|文学部部员A Literature Club Member A
Your were born in...
你出生在……
Aristocratic Family|贵族世家
Artistic Family|艺术世家
Craftsmen Family|机械工匠世家 Mechanical
Hunter's Union|猎人工会
Aristocratic Family|贵族世家

`You belong to a family of nobles. Because your family is so rich, you've liked eating bank notes since you were young, so your classmates treat you as a fool.|你身于贵族名门世家，因为你们家太有钱了，你从小就喜欢吃纸币，所以同班同学都把你当成傻子。`
Artistic Family|艺术世家

`You were born into a locally well-known art family. You've been great at drawing R18 fan books since you were young. You like to take the finished drawings back to class to show off, and always get your butt spanked by the class teacher.|你身于当地有名的艺术世家，你从小最擅长画R18同人本，画完之后就喜欢拿回班里炫耀，所以总是被班主任打屁股。`
Craftsmen Family|机械工匠世家 Mechanical

`You belong to a family of well-known local mechanical craftsmen. You've excelled at creating automated equipment since you were little. You once built an automatic toilet, but it failed. Poop flung onto your entire body, and your classmates called you "poop man".|你身于当地有名的机械工匠家族，你从小最擅长制造自动化器械。有次你造了个自动马桶，但是马桶失灵了，你被喷了一身大便，于是同学都叫你大便人。`
Hunter's Union|猎人工会

`You are an orphan, taken in by the local hunter's union. You've been great at archery since you were a kid. You shot prey in the jungle once, but turned out it was the pet of the lord. As punishment, your left buttcheek was cut off.|你是一名孤儿，被当地的猎人工会收留。你从小最擅长射箭。有一次你在丛林里射中了猎物，结果发现是领主家的宠物。作为惩罚，你左边的屁股被切掉了。`
|文学部部员A Literature Club Member A
After growing up, you decide to...
成年后，你决定……
Head to the imperial capital for better opportunities|前往帝都寻找机会
Head to a New World to find opportunities|前往新大陆寻找机会
Join a mercenary group for opportunities|加入佣兵团寻找机会
Become a wandering bard|作为吟游诗人游走四方
Head to the imperial capital for better opportunities|前往帝都寻找机会

`After growing up, you arrive at the imperial capital. You are tempted by the active lives of the locals. You eat, drink and have fun everyday, making no progress. A year later, you become a debu who makes their living by gambling.|成年后，到了帝都，你被当地人灯红酒绿骄奢淫逸的生活所诱惑，每天吃喝玩乐，不思进取，一年后，你变成了一个靠赌博为生的debu。`
Head to a New World to find opportunities|前往新大陆寻找机会

`After growing up, you arrive at a New World. You learn from the locals, hunting beavers and selling their skin to Cabres traders to earn a living. One day, your head hits a tree while you're out hunting. IQ changed to -50.|成年后，到了新大陆，你向当地人取经，通过捕猎海狸，往卡布雷斯大陆倒卖海狸皮为生。有一天你在打猎的时候头撞到了树上，IQ变为-50。`
Join a mercenary group for opportunities|加入佣兵团寻找机会

`After growing up, you join a mercenary group. You are assigned the role of chef. Because your cooking was too dark, you accidentally poisoned the old corps leader. You took the opportunity to usurp the throne and become the new corps leader.|成年后，你加入了雇佣兵团，并被分配到了厨师一职。由于你做的料理太黑暗，有一次你不小心把兵团老团长毒死了，你趁机篡位成为了新的兵团团长。`
Become a wandering bard|作为吟游诗人游走四方

`After growing up, you hated work, and soon became a wandering bard. Once, you were in a tavern playing and singing poems for guests. A wealthy businessman was very impressed. He gave you a lot of money. You were robbed when you went out.|成年后，你讨厌工作，当起了吟游诗人四处旅行。一次你在酒馆里为客人弹唱吟诗的时候，被富商看重，他给了你很多很多钱，结果你出门就被打劫了。`
|文学部部员A Literature Club Member A

You ultimately settled down and became a staff for a antique shop. Shortly after, an ancient demons tribe invaded the continent of Cabres. One day, they came to ransack your workplace. You decide to...
你最终还是安定下来，并成为了一家古董店的职员。没过多久之后，一个古老的魔族入侵了卡布雷斯大陆。有一天，魔族来洗劫你工作的地方，你决定……
Slip away|溜了溜了
Put on a tough front|正面硬刚
Join them|加入他们
Ignore them|无视他们
Slip away|溜了溜了

`You quietly slipped away, but accidentally fell into a mysterious basement amidst the chaos. The basement was filled with armor and weapons of the braves 500 years ago. You acquired brand new equipment and have become invincible.|你偷偷地逃跑了，但是在混乱之中不小心摔进了一间神秘的地下室，地下室里藏满了500年前勇者的盔甲和武器。你获得了全新的装备，成为了无敌的存在。`
Put on a tough front|正面硬刚

`You put on a tough front. As a result, you were dumped 10 miles away and picked up by a kind monk passing by. In the next 3 years, you work hard at the monk's temple and eventually become a powerful martial artist.|你正面上去和他们硬刚，结果你被甩到了十里之外，被好心路过的僧侣捡回了家。在接下来了3年中，你在僧侣的寺庙里苦心修行，最终变成了武功高强的战士。`
Join them|加入他们

`You take the opportunity to join them. The demon king got word of this, and rewarded your courage with 100,000 demon soldiers. Since then, you've become the invincible general of the demons.|你主动加入他们。此时被魔王知道了，他十分赏识你的勇气，给予了你10万魔族士兵。从此你成为了战无不胜的魔族将军。`
Ignore them|无视他们

`You ignored them, sipping your tea. Everyone thought you were niubi. Because of your niubiness, you became the emperor of the central kingdom of Cabres.|你无视了他们，继续喝茶。后来所有人都觉得你很牛逼，你因为牛逼上天，成为了卡布雷斯大陆中央王国的皇帝。`

|文学部部员A Literature Club Member A
Everyone headed for outer space, and so you chose to...
大家都飞向了外太空，于是你选择……
Stay in Cabres and rebuild your homeland|留在卡布雷斯大陆重建家园
Follow a group of people to a new settlement|跟随一批落单的族人前往新的移居地
You decide to dig a hole underground and build a huge shelter|你决定往地底下挖洞，建造一个大型庇护所
You decide to lie down|你决定摆烂躺平
Stay in Cabres and rebuild your homeland|留在卡布雷斯大陆重建家园

`You weren't willing to see your hometown end up like this. And so, you stayed behind, growing potatoes in large areas on the desolate land. Years pass, and the potatoes you planted grew more than 100 meteres into the ground. Cabres has since become the largest interstellar supplier of potatoes. You've been named the God of Potatoes.|你不甘心故乡变成这副摸样，于是你留了下来，开始在荒凉的土地上大面积种植土豆。多年后，你种植的土豆长往地里长出百米，卡布雷斯成为了星际最大土豆供应商，你被封为土豆之神。`
Follow a group of people to a new settlement|跟随一批落单的族人前往新的移居地

`You settle on an icy planet. Though the planet is extremely cold, there is an abundance of water. Under your leadership, you have established a mechanical empire with steam power as its core, and have become the most famous automation engineer in the galaxy.|你们在一个冰封的星球驻扎了下来。这个星球虽然极为寒冷，但存在着大量的水资源。在你的带领下，你们建立了一个以蒸汽动力为核心的机械帝国，你成为了星际间最有名的自动化技术工程师。`
You decide to dig a hole underground and build a huge shelter|你决定往地底下挖洞，建造一个大型庇护所

`You lead a large number of people underground and discovered an abundance of groundwater resources and mineral veins. Many years later, under your leadership, the kingdom of Cabres was reestablished, with all races coexisting harmoniously, protected from external nuisances. Cabres has become a paradise among the stars. You are dubbed "The Lord of the Cave".|你带领着一大批民众往地底下施工，发现了丰富的地下水资源和矿脉。多年后，在你的带领下，卡布雷斯底下王国建立了起来，各个种族和谐共处，同时免受外界滋扰，成为了星际间流传的世外桃源。你被封为洞穴君主。`
You decide to lie down|你决定摆烂躺平

`You lie down on the now vast and desolate land of Cabres, drinking acid rain and eating soil, day after day, year after year. In the end you became a sculpture, being dug up by people who returned to Cabres after ten thousand years. The people build temples to honor you, have festivals in your name, and you are enshrined by the ancient gods of the planet.|你躺在卡布雷斯辽阔而又荒凉贫瘠的大地上，喝着酸雨，吃着土，日复一日，年复一年。最后你成为了一尊雕塑，万年后被重回卡布雷斯大陆的人挖出来。人们为你建造神殿，创造节日，你被作为的星球远古的神供奉了起来。`

What should you say when you break up?

Twists and Turns|《扭来扭去》
Twists and Turns
扭来扭去

Two brothers were heading home for summer vacation. The beautiful and wide fields of the countryside spanning endlessly for them to run and play in. A wind blew across the fields as they played, yet it alerted them to something strange in the distance.
一对兄弟回家乡过暑假。乡下的田野地区很宽广，到处都是美丽的田园，哪里都是可以奔跑玩耍的地方。当他们玩得正起劲时，田园上忽然吹起了风，他们看到远处有一个异样的东西。

It was a vague white object, seeming to twist and turn from time to time. It is of a humanoid shape, but twists so violently that it occasionally loses that form. Driven by curiosity, the older brother takes out his binoculars to have a better look. What he sees turns his face pale, as he began to sweat and shiver incessantly...
隐约看到是个白色的物体，且不时地扭动。本身看似像人形，但偶尔扭动的幅度巨大，又会失去人的形状。在好奇心驱使下，哥哥拿出望远镜想一探究竟。但随后，哥哥的脸色发白，开始冒冷汗且不停的发抖……

The younger of the two asked with curiosity: "What is it?" The older brother, still in shock, says: "No, it's better that you don't find out". Just as the younger brother picked up the binoculars to see for himself, their grandfather quickly rushed over from behind to stop him.
弟弟好奇地问哥哥：究竟是什么东西? 哥哥惊魂未定地对弟弟说：不，你还是不要知道会比较好…… 正当弟弟拿过望远镜想自己看的时候，爷爷突然从后面冲过来阻止了。

The anxious grandfather said: "Don't look! No looking!" as he ran in front of the two and asked: "You didn't look at that thing right?". The younger one answered: "No". The old man breathed a sigh of relief as he took the two brothers home. The older brother, originally lively and active, didn't say a word on the way home, still having a terrified expression. Seeing his pale face, the younger brother didn't dare ask what had happened.
爷爷着急的说：不要看！不可以看！随后爷爷跑到兄弟俩面前问道：你们都没有看到那个东西吧？弟弟首先回答：没有。爷爷听后松了一口气，便把两兄弟带回家了。原本活泼好动的哥哥，在回家的路上一言不发，依旧是一副惊魂未定的表情。看着哥哥发白的脸色，弟弟便不敢再询问发生了什么。

After returning home, the older brother started behaving strangely: his body twisting as he laughed maniacally. His skin turned from a warm-yellowish to a light gray, like a corpse drained of its blood. His head bobbing around as if ignoring the limitations imposed by bones and muscles. His hands were open, swinging up and down.
回到家后，哥哥开始出现异常的举动：他的身体扭曲，并且疯狂地笑着，皮肤宛如一个被抽干了血液的尸体由黄逐渐变成灰色，头无视着骨骼和肌肉的限制不停的摇摆，双手张开上下划动。

The older brother slowly approached the young one with a crooked smile, one of his eyeballs rolling endlessly while the other fixated on his brother. The young one fell to the ground in fear, screaming and crying out: "Don't come any closer!"
哥哥缓慢的靠近着弟弟，脸上一只眼珠在不停的转动，另一只眼珠紧紧的盯着弟弟，向着弟弟露出了歪斜的笑容。弟弟吓得摔在了地上，一边哭一边叫着：“不要过来！”

The grandfather came and yanked the older brother away and sighed: "He saw it didn't he? Leave your older brother in the countryside and we'll take care of him. He'll never be a normal child again if he goes back like this. If he's sent back to the city, it will be a lot of trouble. Your brother can stay here for a few years. Putting him in the fields is the best solution."
爷爷过来把哥哥拉开，叹气道：哥哥还是看到了，对吧?  把哥哥留在乡下让我们来照顾他吧，哥哥这副模样回去，是没法成为正常孩子的。如果送回都市，一定会造成很大的麻烦。让哥哥留在这里几年，再把他放回田里去，才是最好的解决方法。

The holidays are ending soon, and the elder brother's condition still hasn't improved. Seeing his elder brother's bizarre appearance, the younger one was terrified and could only go back to the city by car. On the way back, the younger brother looked out the car window, gazing at the scenery as he suddenly noticed a white object in his peripheral vision. He was shocked and immediately closed the window. His heartbeat beating faster and faster, it took him a while to calm down.
假期很快就要结束了，哥哥的情况依然没有好转。看着哥哥那诡异的样子，弟弟也十分害怕，只好自己坐车先回都市。回都市的路上，弟弟看着车窗外的风景，此时他眼角的视野中出现了一个白色的东西。弟弟吓了一大跳，立刻关上了车窗，心跳在不断的加快，过了好久才平静下来。
When he looked out again, there was nothing there anymore. Just as he noticed himself in the rearview mirror, all he saw was a crooked smiling face.
然后他再往外看，外面已经看不到什么了，只是他注意到了后视镜中的自己，浮现在上面的是一张扭曲着微笑的脸。
Supernatural Research Club - Story Introduction:
超自然研究部记录-故事介绍：

Kunekune is a well-known Japanese urban legend. A mysterious legend that orignates from the countryside. Regarding the object, people often describe it as: white and translucent, with striking resemblance to a human, seen occasionally by the fields during summer. Elderly locals all know about the tale and say that people who see it will experience mental abnormalities. They typically warn outsiders or children that go to the countryside to play. If they see a white twisting bodies in the distance, never approach them.
クネクネ(扭来扭去)一个日本的知名故事，是个谜一般存在的乡野传说。关于那个不明物体，人们都是这么形容它的：白色半透明状态，跟人长的很像，在夏季的田边偶尔能看见。当地的老人家都知道这件事，还有说人看到了会精神异常等等。当地的老人家都会警告外地人或来乡下玩的小孩子，在远处看到白色扭动体，千万别靠近。

Kunekune are also known as "Scarecrow Gods", said to originate from early agricultural societies. Because of the then underdeveloped medical practices, doctors who treated patients were generally helpless when it came to mental illnesses. The villagers would then tie the unfortunate patient to a scarecrow, letting them fend for themselves. As the person tied up will be desperate to break free, they will use all their strength to twist and turn their bodies.
クネクネ(扭来扭去) 亦可称作"稻草人神" ，故事的原型据说是早期的农业社会，因为医术不发达，所以治病的大夫面对精神病患普遍都束手无策，村民们就直接把可怜的病患绑在稻草人身上，直接放其自生自灭。由于被绑住的人会急着想挣脱，所以会用身体的力气扭来扭去。
Supernatural Research Club - Investigative Records:
超自然研究部记录-探究记录：

Previously, our Club received a mysterious letter in the mail, where we were informed of sightings on twisted and distorted figures in the fields of a certain village. The letter was printed and the sender did not leave a signature. Thus, it was impossible to determine the sender through examining the handwriting. But they had wished for our Club to investigate the matter.
此前我们社团的学生公开信箱内收到了一封神秘来信，信中告诉了我们在某个村庄的田野间发现了扭来扭去的踪影，希望我们超自然社前往调查。信的主人并没有署名，信件也是以打印的方式书写的，完全无法通过辨认字迹的方式找出信主人来。

According to the information in the letter, we made our way to the village. No such objects were found or sighted during the investigation. However, something interesting did happen. We stumbled upon an unplanted field that seemed to have no weeds growing. Just as we were about to investigate, a fierce uncle came to stop us, saying this was his land and we were not allowed to enter, so we left.
根据信件所给出的信息，我们通过导航来到了村庄。但在调查过程中并未发现有此类不明生命物体的存在。不过在调查途中出现了一件有趣的事情：我们偶然发现有一块未种植的田地，但那里却一点杂草也没有。正当我们想要过去调查时，不知从哪里来了一个很凶的大叔把我们拦住了，说那里是他的地盘，不允许进入，我们只好离开了。

When we went on the next day to have a chat with the uncle, we couldn't find him, and the previously barren field was now overgrown with weeds. As no further information could be obtained, we ended the expedition. Additionally, when we left, a member of the expedition said she felt a presence behind always staring at her.
第二天但当我们再次前往那里，想和那位大叔聊一聊的时候，却怎么也找不到他，而原先那块荒芜的田地也忽然杂草丛生。由于无法收集更多的信息，只好结束这次的田野搜查。此外，在我们离开时，有一位部员说她感觉背后总有什么人在看着她。

Several members wanted to return to the field this year to conduct more research, but the name of the village disapeared on the tourism app. When we called to confirm with the tourism Club, they insisted that they had never organized a tour of that area either. It is as if the village has disappeared into thin air. The letter sent during that time also seemed to have been lost during the last expedition.
本来今年我们几位部员想要再一次前往这个田野完成这项研究，却发现旅游APP上没有了这个乡村的名字，在打电话向旅游部门确认时他们说也从来没有组织过这个地方的旅游。那个乡村似乎就像凭空消失了一样。而当时的那封寄来的信，也似乎是在上次前往调查的过程中丢失了。
Due to these reasons, no follow-up investigations may be conducted. These are the twists and turns of all the current investigation results.
因为这个原因，后续的调查也无法再继续进行。这就是扭来扭去目前所有的调查结果了。
Recorded by: Freelyn, Club President of Supernatural Research Club
记录人：菲林，超自然研究部部长
选择
The Cat-Faced Old Lady|《猫脸老太太》
The Cat-Faced Old Lady
猫脸老太太

The story takes place on a cold winter night in a region in the 1990s, more than 30 years ago. There was an old lady who's husband's surname was Li, but no one knew her surname. She lived in a small village and had a bad relationship with her daughter-in-law who lives with her. Life was often a bumpy ride for her.
故事发生在上个世纪九十年代某地区的一个寒冬夜，距今已有三十多年。有一个老太太，她丈夫姓李，但她姓什么，没有人知道。她住在一个小村子里，与同住的儿媳关系并不好，生活时常有磕磕碰碰。
Because of some trivial matters down the line, the old lady and daughter-in-law got into a fight. The old lady got so angry that she hanged herself. She died full of hatred, wearing a blood-red robe.
后来有次因为一些小事，老太太和儿媳打了起来。老太太因此气不过，上吊自杀了。怀着恨意而死的她，上吊时身上穿着鲜血般红色的衣袍。

When the body was discovered, it was said the day was very cloudy, her death being quite horrific: her eyes were wide open, her tongue sticking out, her face was black, her features twisted with a hideous expression. No one dared to take a step forward until her son arrived, knelt in front of the old lady and wept bitterly. Only then did they dare to get the old day down.
尸体被发现时，据闻当时天很阴，她的死相也相当骇人：眼睛瞪得很大，舌头伸在了外面，面部呈黑色，五官扭在一起，表情很狰狞。当时人们都不敢靠前，直到老人的儿子赶来了，跪在老人身前痛哭，大家才敢把老太太给弄下来。

After the son helped the old lady change into her graveclothes, he decided to mourn for the night. When his neighbor saw him grieving, he went up to talk with the mourning son. It was a long winter night, and the neighbor fell asleep while talking. Just then, a wild cat suddenly jumped onto the old lady's corpse. The cat's limbs tensed up like a piece of wood and it fell to the ground.
儿子为老人换上寿衣后，决定彻夜守孝。邻居见儿子悲痛欲绝，便上前陪他说话。冬天的夜晚很长，邻居说着说着就睡着了。这时候一只野猫突然跳到了老人的遗体上，只见猫四肢突然绷紧，像一块木头一样定住，而后摔到了地上。

The old lady's corpse suddenly shot up. Her face changing from dark to sallow, her mouth changed into the shape of a cat's mouth, and licking her hand that slowly grew cat claws. The son was terrified, cold sweat dripping down. He instinctively tried to scream, but no sound came out.
接着，老人的尸体突然坐起。她的脸色从暗色逐渐变得蜡黄，嘴巴变成了猫嘴的形状，一边还舔舐着逐渐长出爪子的手。儿子吓坏了，冷汗直流，本能地想发出尖叫，却一点声音也出不来。

The cat-faced old lady glanced at the sleeping neighbor, jumping and climbing on top of him, frantically scratching him. The son, paralyzed with fear, rolled away and ran out of the house, howling: "Help!!!"
猫脸的老太太看到了正熟睡的邻居，顿时跃起，攀到他身上，对他疯狂地抓挠。儿子被吓得瘫倒在地上，连滚带爬跑出了屋子，嚎叫着：“救命啊！！！”

Generally speaking, people in the village head to bed earlier and it becomes extremely quiet at night. If someone suddenly shouted, the village dogs would surely bark in response. Strangely, none of the dogs responded to the son's cry for help that night. At best, they only dared to grunt.
一般来说，村里人睡觉比较早，到了晚上则会变得安静无比。若此时有人突然大声叫喊，村里的狗肯定也会应声吼叫。奇怪的是，那天晚上村子里没有一只狗应着儿子的高声求救吼叫起来，有的充其量也只敢低声哼哼。

The old lady's son rushed down the road to another house. After the family learned of the situation, they kindly took him in for the night. After daybreak, the son went with more than 20 other villagers to check the situation at his house. They only managed to find the neighbor whose stomach had been torn apart, laying dead on the ground. The old lady was long gone.
老人的儿子顺着路冲到村子的一户人家里。那户人家得知情况后，好心地收留了儿子过夜。天亮后，儿子找了二十多位村民回家里查看情况，却只在家中发现了肚子被撕破，惨死在地上的邻居。此时老人早已不见了踪影。

Afterwards, there would always be animals and children disappearing from the village, inducing widespread panic amongst the villagers. At the time, adults would tell their children not to run around. If they really did run into that thing, they could run around a corner, as it's said that zombies can't turn corners.
后来村子里总有动物不见，甚至发展为几个小孩子也没了，弄得人心惶惶。当时大人都告诉小孩，没事不要乱跑，要是真碰见那东西了，就绕着弯跑，因为据说僵尸是不会转弯的。
Supernatural Research Club - Story Introduction
超自然研究部记录-故事介绍：

"The Cat-Faced Old Lady" is a well-known story in the region from the 1990s. The story has been passed down through storytelling and gossip, changing hands so many times that it is no longer possible to obtain its original context. At the time, many people tied red strips of cloth at the entrance to their homes, as red objects were believed to have the effect of warding off evil spirits.
《猫脸老太》是上世纪90年代该地区的知名故事。故事通过口口相传的方式几经转手后，已经无法考究其原貌。当时许多人都在自家门口栓红布条，因为红色的物体一般被认为有辟邪的功能。

The local elementary school even convened a special meeting for parents, requiring students to go to school in pairs and have red rope tied on them. It is said that even though the local police station managed to capture and kill the cat-faced old lady, incidents of missing children still continue until this day.
当地小学还特地为此召开了家长会，要求学生上下学一定要结伴而行，且必须绑一根红绳上学。据说后来即使当地警局成功捕获猫脸老太太并已将其捕获击毙，小孩失踪的事件依然在持续发生。

Regarding the origin of this story, it is said that due to economic depression in the area at the time, there was a lot of human trafficking and crime taking place. Human traffickers would put on cat masks when searching for and kidnapping people in order to hide their faces. The children who died as a result of imprisonment or torture were so desperate to see their parents in their final moments that their yearning turned into resentment. That they were fated to wander the earth as spirits, taking the form of cats and hating all children that were loved by their parents.
关于该故事的起源，有一种说法是由于当时该地区经济萧条，滋生了大量人口贩卖与犯罪，有不少人贩子为了掩人耳目在搜寻绑架目标的时候总会带上猫脸的面具。被绑架后因遭到囚禁或虐待而不幸遇难的儿童，死前对父母极度的思念化作怨念，以猫的形态化作冤魂徘徊在人间，并仇视着所有被父母疼爱的小孩。
Supernatural Research Club - Investigative Records:
超自然研究部记录-探索记录：

The reason this incident caught our attention was that one of our members came from a country next to the one the incident occured in. At first, she didn't want to bring up the matter. It was because of our club president asking about the red rope tied to her ankle that she decided to tell us about this story.
该事件引起我们注意的原因，是由于我们其中有一位部员就来自于事发地旁边的县城。起初她并不想主动提起此事，是由于我们部长对于她脚踝上一直系着的红绳发问，她才告诉了我们这个故事。

According to her, her parents tied the rope to her ankle ever since she was a child, telling her to not take it off after leaving the house. She had always obeyed and had never untied it. Due to the distance involved, our expedition team could not go to the area for on-site investigations, so we gave up on researching this incident.
具她所述，她父母自幼便在把绳子系在她的脚上，并时常叮嘱离开家后无论何时都不能摘下。而她也一直遵守了父母的要求，从未有解开过。由于距离遥远，我们社团无法前往当地进行实地探访，因此放弃了对该单个事件的研究。

However, this incident has inspired us to explore other supernatural events. It is often said that cats are psychic. The appearance of a cat-faced old lady further proves that cats may have some connections with many supernatural phenomena that we cannot see.
但这个事件给予了我们很多关于探究其他灵异事件的启发。常有人说猫是通灵性的。猫脸老太的出现，进一步证明了猫或许与许多我们无法看到的，超自然现象有着某种联系。

Yume Sakura High School has always had a saying that "no cats will appear". It seems that no one has seen a wild cat around the school grounds since it was founded. Even if someone wanted to bring a pet cat to school, the cat would be very reluctant before entering the school gate, even scratching the owner and slipping away.
梦樱高校中一直流传着“不会出现猫”的说法，似乎这所学校从建校以来没有任何人在学校里见到过野猫。即使有人要把宠物猫带回学校，猫咪也会在进入校门之前表现出极其抗拒的态度，甚至不惜抓伤主人溜掉。

What's interesting is, some people have reported hearing meowing in unfrequented areas of the school, which naturally caught the interest of the Supernatural Research Club. In view of this, we set up investigation team NEKO to collect reports on cat-related incidents around the school.
而有趣的是，近期学校里总有人说在一些无人的角落里听到过猫叫，这自然便引起了我们超自然社的关注。鉴于此，我们成立了NEKO调查组，专门搜集校内关于猫的传说以及各种事件。
Things aren't going as well as we had thought...
事情远没有我们想象的发展顺利……

In the past few weeks, the progress of our investigation has been hampered. Whenever we collect some important information, notes and evidence are always lost in the most ridiculous of ways: interview records splashed with water making the text blurry, notebooks in cabinets cleared out by cleaning staff without our knowledge. Even if we use mobile phones or recording equipment to record, the data will inadvertently disappear.
在过去几周当中，我们的调查进度一直受到了阻碍。每当我们收集到一些重要内容时，笔记与证据总会以各种难以置信的方式丢失或遭到损毁：采访记录被水浸透模糊了文字，装在柜子里的笔记本在我们不知情时被清洁人员收走，即便我们使用录音机或者手机等设备进行记录，数据也会在不经意间消失。

All these coincidences seem to indicate that the direction of our research is correct, that there is some invisible force trying to stop the investigation. No matter what it is, it must have powers beyond our imagination. Are the destruction of our records a warning?
种种巧合似乎都意味着我们研究的方向是正确的，我们似乎在被某种无形的规则或意志阻挠着调查工作的开展。不管那是什么东西，一定都有着我们无法想象的力量，而其对于这些记录的抹杀是否意味着一种警告？
To ensure the safety of our members, should we consider terminating this project? This is what I must consider as the club president.
为了保证我们部员的安全，我们有必要考虑是否停止这项调查企划？这是我作为部长必须思考的问题。
Recorded by: Freelyn, Club President of Supernatural Research Club
记录人：菲林，超自然研究部部长
